TopicTitle: A new 3 crew soyuz style capsule and a new 4 crew capsule

Articles.Content: I think the title is very descriptive, now we only have 2 types of manned capsules in stock, i think it should be great to have 2 or more new capsules, in my opinion one should be a soyuz-style capsule and the other should be 4 crew capsule of 2.5 meters taller than the Mk1-2 capsule. Would you like adding more capsules to the game? If the answer is yes, what style do you think should they be?

1.25 meter Soyuz capsule, with a crew of 2. (I notice a lot of extra room in the Mk1 Compod....)

A taller compod for 2.5 meters? I don't know.....

I guess, but maybe 5 or 6 instead of 4.

Also, a 3.75 meter compod would be nice!
you could check out Home Grown Rockets (And their dev thread)
